value.name: Pete Hardin calls on Todd Spitzer to make charging decision in deadly shooting of Hector Hernandez
value.description: Pete Hardin, who is running for Orange County District Attorney, demands sitting DA Todd Spitzer to make a decision in the case.

value.name: Search expands for homicide suspect
value.description: The search for homicide suspect, Hector Hernandez-Diaz, 40, of Richmond is expanding state, and nationwide. Hector is suspected of killing Andrea Hernandez, a 35-year-old mother of three. As of Thursday, May 13, at 12:30 p.m. Assistant Chief of Richmond ...

value.name: Richmond murder victim identified; police looking for ‘armed & dangerous’ suspect
value.description: Police are asking the public to be on the lookout for Hector Hernandez-Diaz, 40, of Richmond. Officers said he may be driving a silver car and should be considered armed and dangerous. NEW from ...

value.name: Family organizes GoFundMe for Hernandez
value.description: Loved ones of Andrea Hernandez are asking the community for help to raise funds to send the 35-year-old's body back home to Mexico. Hernandez's body was discovered last week in her home in what police have said is a suspected homicide.

value.name: Updated: Central Kentucky police look for suspect in a homicide after finding body
value.description: Hector Hernandez-Diaz, who may also go by Hector Diaz-Hernandez, is wanted in connection to a killing that Richmond police began investigating Wednesday morning. The 40-year-old man was believed ...
